channel.description: Recent content in Blog on HEIR

item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2024-04-18
item.description: Here are the notes and video recording from the HEIR meeting on 2024-04-18.

item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2023-10-24
item.description:
Here are the notes and video recording from the HEIR meeting on 2023-10-24.

Also of note: our talk at FHE.org was last Thursday (recording), and the similar talk at the LLVM developers meeting talk was the previous Wednesday, though the video has not yet been posted for that.

item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2023-08-29
item.description: Here are the notes from the HEIR meeting on 2023-08-29. There was an issue with the recording, so there is no video recording this week.

item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2023-08-01
item.description:
The fourth HEIR meeting was 2023-08-01 (notes and video recording).

We’re also starting on the Poly and Secret dialects in #74 (poly) and #78 (secret), so please join in the fun!

item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2023-06-30
item.description:
The second HEIR meeting was 2023-05-30 (notes, and video recording).

There are some initial design discussion threads started on GitHub Discussions to get the design rolling.

  • High-Level FHE Dialect
  • Scheme Dialects
  • Poly/Math Dialects
